Articles.Content: Make the most exotic vessel you can think of, that works. There is also a sub challenge to make it as small as you can. Modded parts, modified stock parts, and even flowers are encouraged. Go.

"Exotic"?

Please read the challenge submission guidelines, and then rewrite the challenge.

EDIT: Just saw that this isn't in the challenges sections, but I'm still confused.

I've a few already!:

A Batman-like VTOL multipurpose ship called the BATVTOL (link in signature)

A working bipedal robot able to walk, and fly like a jet, and punch stuff (link in signature)

And the third one, will be released soon ;D
Nothing too special, just a bipedal walker and some ornithopters.
I have a station looking ship capable of Minmus orbit and return (I think.) It's just 1 man but you can stick a buncho stuff on it.

The thread was moved, not even sure that the spacecraft exchange is the best place for it either, as has been said you really need to look at the challenge submission guide as it's not just there for decoration, it's there to help people make challenges that make sense.

Parallax, thanks for your submission but I think I should close this, SeventhArchitect, please look at the guide and try again
